definition: to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: We have new information about the palm beach bomber .
sentences.chinese: 關於棕櫚灘投彈手我們有最新消息。

sentences.english: That’s about 20 times the amount of bombs dropped on Iraq this year.
sentences.chinese: 實際投彈將近是今年在伊拉克投下炸彈量的20倍。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the X-ray characteristics of humeral spiral fracture cau sed by hand grenade throwing.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究士兵投彈所致的肱骨螺旋骨折的X線特徵。

sentences.english: I ordered the bombers which had completed their runs to return to our carriers.
sentences.chinese: 我命令投彈完畢的轟炸機飛返母艦。

sentences.english: "They'll dive bomb you and hit you in your head, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 它們向你俯衝投彈，拍打你的頭。
